structure.unit: ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES -- PROHIBITIONS, RESTRICTIONS, AND REGULATIONS

text.section: Manufacturers and importers of distilled spirits and wine may advertise and promote, by specific brand and bottle size, distilled spirits and wine for off-premises consumption by use of rebate coupons.

Rebate coupons are redeemable by the consumer at the point of purchase, or by mail-in certificate by which the consumer receives a cash refund or nonalcoholic beverage merchandise from the manufacturer, importer, or clearinghouse acting for the manufacturer or importer, upon submission by the consumer of the required proof of purchase.
Rebate coupons on malt beverages are prohibited.

law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 289, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.
